title: Sage West's Guide To Making Dead Men Talk Art
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]

+ [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/sage-west-s-guide-to-making-dead-men-talk/comments/show “I like you more,” Sage said, not dishonestly. Jack grunted. “I can’t tell whether that’s a good thing.”]

[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:sage-west-s-guide-to-making-dead-men-talk-art/2024_01_23_0g9_Kleki.png]]

> This is some art I did as a cover for the recent tale I posted! It's linked above, so you should go read it to better understand the story.If not, I hope you enjoy this sketch :). [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost This is my Author page, if you want to look at more of my work.] Have a lovely day!
[[/=]]
author: Dr Vikki Lost
